TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 列表视图控件，该控件显示可用四种不同视图之一显示的项集合。

span.span: Represents a Windows list view control, which displays a collection of items that can be displayed using one of four different views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件，可以显示包含项文本的项列表，还可以显示用于标识项类型的图标。A control allows you to display a list of items with item text and, optionally, an icon to identify the type of item. 例如，Windows 资源管理器列表在外观上与 控件相似。For example, the Windows Explorer list of files is similar in appearance to a control. 它显示树中当前选定的文件和文件夹的列表。It displays a list of the files and folders currently selected in the tree. 每个文件和文件夹都显示一个与之关联的图标，以帮助标识文件或文件夹的类型。Each file and folder displays an icon associated with it to help identify the type of file or folder. 类表示控件中的项 。The class represents an item within a control. 列表中显示的项可以显示为五种不同视图中的一种。The items that are displayed in the list can be shown in one of five different views. 项可以显示为大图标、小图标或垂直列表中的小图标。Items can be displayed as large icons, as small icons, or as small icons in a vertical list. 项还可以具有子项，其中包含与父项相关的信息。Items can also have subitems which contain information that is related to the parent item. "详细信息视图" 允许您在网格中显示项及其子项，其中的列标题用于标识子项中显示的信息。The details view allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 按如下所述的可用性有限的磁贴视图允许将项及其子项显示为磁贴，其中包含文本信息旁边的大图标。The tile view, which has limited availability as described below, allows you to display the item and its subitems as a tile that contains a large icon next to the textual information. 支持单个或多个选择。 supports single or multiple selection. 多选功能使用户能够以类似于控件的方式从项列表中进行选择 。The multiple selection feature lets the user select from a list of items in a way similar to a control. 此外，用户还可以激活选定项来执行任务。Additionally, the user can activate selected items to perform a task. 例如，你可以使用 控件来显示应用程序可以打开和使用的文件的列表。For example, you could use a control to display a list of files that the application can then open and utilize. 用户可以选择要打开的文件，然后双击它们以激活项目并在应用程序中打开文件。The user can select the files to open and then double-click them to activate the items and open the files in the application. 还可以使用属性显示复选框， 以允许用户检查他们要对其执行操作的项。The can also display check boxes, using the property, to allow the user to check the items that they want to perform an action on. 可以通过 多种方式使用该控件。You can use the control in a variety of ways. 控件可用于显示来自应用程序、数据库或文本文件的信息。The control can be used to display information from an application, a database, or a text file. 还可用于从用户那里获取信息，例如选择一组要处理的文件。The can also be used to obtain information from the user, such as selecting a set of files to process. 提供大量属性，这些属性提供了外观和行为的灵活性。 provides a large number of properties that provide flexibility in appearance and behavior. 属性允许您更改项的显示方式。The property allows you to change the way in which items are displayed. 利用、 和 属性，您可以指定 包含为项显示的图像的对象，如果为，则可以指定在 属性设置为时显示的复选框 `true` 。The , , and properties allow you to specify the objects that contain the images displayed for items and, in the case of the , the check boxes that are displayed when the property is set to `true`. 若要确定哪些项已选中，可以使用 属性访问该 集合。To determine which items are checked, you can use the property to access the collection. 属性允许访问 ，后者存储在 将控件的属性设置为时显示的列标题 。The property allows access to the , which stores the column headers that are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 通过属性在中添加和移除项 。Items are added and removed from the through the property. 属性允许您访问 控件的，该控件提供操作控件中的项的方法。The property allows you to access the of the control, which provides methods for manipulating the items in the control. 如果希望允许用户编辑项的文本，则可以使用 属性。If you want to allow the user to edit the text of an item, you can use the property. 当控件包含大量项时，用户通常可以更轻松地在排序列表中查看它们。When your control contains a large number of items, it is often easier for the user to see them in a sorted list. 你可以使用 属性按字母顺序对项进行排序。You can use the property to sort the items alphabetically. 您还可以完全自定义控件的外观 。You can also completely customize the appearance of a control. 为此，请将 属性设置为， `true` 并处理以下一个或多个事件： 、 、 。To do this, set the property to `true` and handle one or more of the following events: , , . 当 控件的属性设置为时，将使用控件的许多属性 。Many of the properties of the control are used when the property of the control is set to . 属性允许控件的用户 在运行时重新配置列的顺序。The property allows the user of your control to reconfigure the order of columns at run time. 属性允许选择项及其子项，而不是仅选择项。The property allows an item and its subitems to be selected instead of just the item. 若要在详细信息视图中显示网格线以标识中的项和子项的边界 ，可使用 属性。To display gridlines in the details view to identify the boundaries of items and subitems in the , you can use the property. 属性允许您指定要显示的列标题的类型。The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display. 控件可以在虚拟模式下运行，在此模式下， 将动态生成对象，而不是将其存储在 集合中。A control can operate in virtual mode, where objects are generated dynamically instead of being stored in the collection. 这对于处理非常大的列表或其内容经常更改的列表很有用。This can be useful for dealing with very large lists or lists whose contents frequently change. 若要启用虚拟模式，请将 属性设置为， `true` 并处理 、 和 事件。To enable Virtual mode, set the property to `true` and handle the , , and events. 除了可用于控件的多个属性 ，应用程序还可以使用方法和事件向提供附加功能 。In addition to the many properties that are available for a control, there are methods and events that your application can use to provide additional capabilities to the . 通过和 方法，你可以在将多个项添加到时提高性能， 方法是防止控件在每次添加项时都重新绘制。The and methods allow you to improve performance when you add many items to a by preventing the control from repainting every time that an item is added. 如果 控件正在显示项和子项，你可能希望在用户右键单击子项时提供功能。If your control is displaying items and subitems, you may want to provide functionality when the user right-clicks a subitem. 若要确定要在其中单击子项的项，可以使用 方法。To determine the item whose subitem is being clicked, you can use the method. 在用户编辑项后执行项验证时，可能需要向用户显示要更改的特定项。When performing validation of the items after the user has edited them, you may want to display a specific item to the user to change. 可以调用方法以确保特定项位于控件的可视区域中。The method can be called to ensure that the specific item is in the visible area of the control. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则可以通过为和事件创建事件处理程序来执行一些任务，如验证文本更改前后编辑的文本 。If the property set to `true`, you can perform tasks such as validating the text being edited before and after the text changed by creating an event handler for the and events. 若要执行打开文件或显示对话框以编辑中显示的项等任务 ，可以为事件创建事件处理程序 。To perform tasks such as opening a file or displaying a dialog box to edit an item displayed in a , you can create an event handler for the event. 如果允许用户在单击列标题时对中的项进行排序 ，则可以为事件创建事件处理程序 以执行排序。If you allow the user to sort the items in a when they click a column header, you can create an event handler for the event to perform the sorting. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，你可以通过处理事件来确定项的检查状态发生更改的时间 。When the property is set to `true`, you can determine when a change in an item's check state has occurred by handling the event. 你还可以使用属性设置的背景图像 。You can also set a background image for the with the property. 应用程序必须具有 其 `Main` 方法才能正确显示控件的背景图像 。Your application must have the on its `Main` method to correctly display the background image for the control. 此外，如果 具有背景图像的控件承载于 Internet Explorer 中，请在应用程序清单文件中指定 comctl32.dll 版本6.0 作为依赖程序集，以确保显示背景图像属性。In addition, if a control with a background image is hosted in Internet Explorer, specify comctl32.dll version 6.0 as a dependent assembly in the application manifest file to ensure the background image is property displayed. > [!NOTE] > 对于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本1.1 和更早版本中光标的外观，设置控件的属性不会有任何影响。Setting the property for a control has no affect on the appearance of the cursor in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versions 1.1 and earlier. 当应用程序调用方法时，windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 提供了三种增强控件的功能 ：磁贴视图、分组和插入标记。Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 provide three features that enhance the control when your application calls the method: tile view, grouping, and the insertion mark. 磁贴视图使你可以通过在大图标旁边显示项和子项文本来平衡图形和文本信息。The tile view lets you balance graphical and textual information by displaying item and subitem text next to large icons. 将 属性设置为以 启用此行为。Set the property to to enable this behavior. 通过分组功能，您可以直观地将项分组到相关类别。The grouping feature lets you visually group items into related categories. 若 要启用此功能，请使用属性将对象添加到 控件。Use the property to add objects to the control when you want to enable this feature. 若要暂时禁用该功能，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To temporarily disable the feature, set the property to `false`. 利用插入标记功能，您可以提供拖放项，并通过视觉反馈来指示放置位置。The insertion mark feature lets you provide drag-and-drop item repositioning with visual feedback to indicate drop locations. 使用 通过属性检索的对象 来显示插入标记。Use the object retrieved through the property to display the insertion mark. 这些功能仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 中提供。These features are available only under Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. 在早期的操作系统上，与这些功能相关的代码不起作用，磁贴视图显示为大图标视图，并且插入标记和组不显示。On earlier operating systems, the code that relate to these features has no effect, the tile view appears as the large icon view, and the insertion mark and groups do not display. 在某些情况下，你可能希望包含用于确定这些功能是否可用的代码，并在这些功能不可用时提供其他功能。In some cases, you might want to include code that determines whether these features are available, and provide alternate functionality when they are unavailable. 这些功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。These features are provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. 下表显示了其中的某些 成员和有效视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户激活某个项必须要执行的操作的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定用户将如何激活控件中的项 。The property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the control. 在中激活项 不同于只选择项。Activating an item in a differs from just selecting an item. 激活项后，通常会在事件的事件处理程序中执行操作 。When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the event. 例如，当激活某项时，您可能会打开一个文件或显示允许编辑该项的对话框。For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited. 通常，用户可通过双击项来激活该项。Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则单击该项一次会激活它。If the property is set to , clicking the item one time activates it. 将 属性设置为 不同于标准双击，因为这两次单击的时间之间可能有任何持续时间。Setting the property to differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 或 ，则不允许使用标签编辑，无论属性的值如何 。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 成员之一。

span.span: The value specified is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户完成修改项的文本时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 用户为该项键入的新字符串将传递给事件，事件处理程序可以拒绝更改。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件处理程序拒绝更改，则文本恢复为用户开始编辑该项之前的文本。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. > [!NOTE] > 由于在 提交标签编辑之前发生事件，因此 在此事件的处理程序中调用方法将使用原始值对项进行排序。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. 为了 引发事件， 必须将控件的属性 设置为 `true` 。In order for the event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 可以为事件创建事件处理程序， 以便在用户编辑项的文本之前执行任务。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件将 新编辑的标签限制为字母表中的字符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用 类获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符在表示数字的 ASCII 代码之间，则新标签不能应用于该项目。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例要求你已 在窗体上创建了一个控件并向其中添加了项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求您已将事件连接 到在代码示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 为了使用 类，您的文件必须包含 命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性设置为，则设置属性的值将 不起作用 。Setting the value of the property has no effect unless the property is set to . 您可以使用此属性来允许用户在运行时重新定位控件中的列。You can use this property to allow users to reposition columns in the control at run time. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，用户可以将这些列放置在控件中，以满足应用程序中的需要的方式显示项及其子项。When the property is set to `true`, users can position the columns in the control to display the item and its subitems in a way that meets their needs within your application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户开始修改项的文本时发生该事件。The event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户无法编辑文本。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text. 你可以使用此事件来阻止用户编辑控件中的特定项 。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果 将控件的属性 设置为，则 `false` 不会 引发事件; 将自动拒绝所有用户尝试编辑项标签。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件以及如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的控件的窗体中，其中 `ListView1` 至少填充了三项。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least three items. 确保该示例中的事件处理程序与事件相关联。Ensure the event handler in the example is associated with its event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加多个项的首选方法 是使用 通过) 的属性访问的 (的方法 。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以在单个操作中将一组项添加到列表中。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the every time that an item is added. 完成将项添加到控件的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 通过这种添加项的方式，可以在将 大量项添加到控件时阻止 flickered 的绘制。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when lots of items are being added to the control. 如果多次 调用，则 必须调用等效的次数。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 直到对的最后一个调用才 会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此外，多次调用 不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示了如何使用 和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的的窗体中 `ListView1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `ListView1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您在列表中的每一项旁显示复选框。The property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list. 这使应用程序能够显示 (和子项的项列表（如果该 属性设置为 `View.Details` 用户可以通过单击复选框选择的) ）。This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box. 属性提供了一种方法，用于在控件中选择多个项， 而无需使用 CTRL 键。The property offers a way to select multiple items in the control without using the CTRL key. 根据您的应用程序，如果使用复选框来选择项，而不是使用标准多选方法，则用户可能会更容易。Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user. 即使控件的 属性 设置为 `false` ，仍然可以显示复选框，并为用户提供多个选择功能。Even if the property of the control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user. 如果你不想要选择多个项，但仍希望允许用户从列表中选择多个项以在应用程序中执行操作，则此功能会很有用。This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application. 若要确定项是否已选中，请为事件创建事件处理程序 。To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the event. 若要获取中已签入的所有项 ，请使用 属性访问控件的 。To get all the items that are checked in the , use the property to access the for the control. 若要获取中已签入的所有项的索引 ，请使用 属性。To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the , use the property. 如果 在属性中指定了 ，则将显示中索引位置0和1之间的图像， 而不是复选框。If an is specified in the property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 显示位于索引位置0的图像而不是未选中的复选框，并显示索引位置1处的图像而不是选中的复选框。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box. > [!NOTE] > 将此属性设置为时 `true` ，将 发生事件。When you set this property to `true`, the event occurs. > > 当属性设置为时，不会显示复选框 。Check boxes are not displayed when the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为) 时，如果用户在控件中的项的详细信息视图中单击其中一个列标题，则会发生该事件 ( 。The event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). 此 事件通常用于对中的项进行排序，以便 使用单击的列作为要排序的列。The event is typically handled to sort the items in the using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件，该控件在单击控件中的列时手动对项进行排序 。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为 `ListViewItemComparer` 的类，该类实现 执行比较的接口 。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建一个实例 `ListViewItemComparer` ，并使用它来设置 控件的属性 。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 事件处理程序中的方法调用 使用在中定义的方法 `ListViewItemComparer` ，根据所单击的列来执行项的排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. summary.span: 在绘制 并且 属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is drawn and the property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件使你可以 使用所有者描述自定义控件的外观。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 仅当属性设置为时，才会引发此方法 `true` 。It is raised only when the property is set to `true`. 有关所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅 属性参考主题。For more information about owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 每个项都可能发生该事件 。The event can occur for each item. 当 属性设置为时 ， 和 事件也会发生。When the property is set to , the and events also occur. 在这种情况下，你可以处理 事件以绘制所有项（如背景）的通用元素，并处理 事件以绘制单个子项（如文本值）的元素。In this case, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 你还可以仅使用两个事件中的一个来绘制控件中的所有项 ，但这可能不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，必须处理 事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 由于基础 Win32 控件中的 bug， 当鼠标指针移到行上时，将发生事件，而不会在 详细信息视图中为每行伴随事件发生一次，从而导致在事件处理程序中绘制的任何内容 都将由事件处理程序中绘制的自定义背景绘制 。Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the event occurs without accompanying events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a event handler. 请参阅参考主题中的示例， 了解在发生额外事件时将使每行失效的解决方法。See the example in the reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs. 另一种解决方法是将所有自定义绘图代码放在 事件处理程序中，并在整个项目中绘制背景 (包括子项) 仅当 该值为0时才会出现。An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the value is 0. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了 事件处理程序的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件使你可以 使用所有者描述自定义控件的外观。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 仅当 属性设置为 `true` ，并且 属性设置为时，才会引发此方法 。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to . 有关所有者描述的详细信息，请参阅 属性参考主题。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常显示在图块视图和详细信息视图中，但在磁贴视图中，必须在事件的处理程序中进行绘制 。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 每个子项可能发生该事件 。The event can occur for each subitem. 您可以处理 事件以绘制所有子项（如背景）公用的元素，并处理 事件以绘制单个子项（如文本值）的元素。You can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 你还可以仅使用两个事件中的一个来绘制控件中的所有项 ，但这可能不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，必须处理 事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 对于 没有 对象已添加到集合中的任何子项，不会发生该事件 。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个对象的第一个子项 表示父项本身，并显示在第一列中。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了 事件处理程序的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加多个项的首选方法 是使用 通过) 的属性访问的 (的方法 。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 这使您可以在单个操作中将一组项添加到列表中。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added. 完成将项添加到控件的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 通过这种添加项的方式，可以在将 大量项添加到控件时阻止 flickered 的绘制。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the control. 如果多次 调用，则 必须调用等效的次数。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 直到对的最后一个调用才 会重新绘制。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 除此外，多次调用 不起作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件以包含复选框。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它还演示了如何使用 和 方法。It also demonstrates using the and methods. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的的窗体中 `ListView1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `ListView1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来确保特定项在控件中可见 。You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the control. 对中的项执行验证时 ，可以调用 方法，以确保在控件中显示验证失败的项 以允许用户对该项执行更改。When performing validation on the items in a , you can call the method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the control to allow the user to perform changes on the item. 如果您想要确保的项是可见的 ，则调用 方法将滚动控件的内容，直到它成为控件的可视区域中的第一项。If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control. 如果该项位于控件的可查看区域之下 ，则调用 方法将滚动控件的内容， 直到该项成为控件的可视区域中的最后一项。If the item is below the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control. 若要确定某个项是否位于控件的显示区域的顶部 ，请使用 属性。To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a control, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索不区分大小写。The search is case-insensitive. `text`参数可以指定所需的匹配文本的子字符串。The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text. 此外，此方法将返回以指定文本开头的第一项。In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text. 例如，如果 包含两个列表项，则第一个项的文本设置为 "尖括号"，第二项的文本设置为 "方括号"- 作为参数传递的调用 `brack` 将返回文本为 "方括号" 的项。For example, if a contains two list items - the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket" - a call to passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket". `null` 如果列表为空或没有匹配项，则该方法返回。The method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializeFindListView` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeFindListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 单击该按钮可查看方法调用的结果。Click the button to see the results of the method call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回，该 对象表示当前显示控件的聚焦框的项 。The property returns the that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the control. 由于 控件没有直接可编辑的区域，而不是它所显示的项，因此当 控件具有焦点时，中的项将 显示焦点围绕其项文本的 reticle。Because a control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the control has focus, an item within the displays the focus reticle around its item text. 通常，控件中最后一个选定的项 是具有焦点的项。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 尽管项可能是显示焦点 reticle 的项，但实际上可能并不是中的选定项 。Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the . 使用 或 属性获取控件中的选定项 ， 不一定要选择属性。Use the or properties to obtain the selected items in the control, the property is not necessarily selected. 您可以使用 属性来确定控件中最后一次单击的项 ，而不考虑选择状态。You can use the property to determine which item was last clicked in the control, regardless of selection state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非将 控件的属性设置为，否则属性不起作用 。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 当显示具有多个子项的项时，通常使用属性 ，当项文本由于控件的内容水平滚动而不可见时，此属性很重要。The property is typically used when a displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 设置为 `true` ，将不会显示的工具提示， 只显示父项的工具提示 。When is set to `true`, ToolTips for a will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以确定哪个项位于控件的客户端区域内的特定位置 。The method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the control. 当用户单击或右键单击子项时，可以使用此方法 (当 属性设置为 ") " 时， `View.Details` 您希望确定哪个项拥有在用户单击鼠标时基于鼠标坐标单击的子项。You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse. > [!NOTE] > 当 属性值为时 `false` ，此方法仅当指定位置位于父项的边界内时才会返回项 (在控件处于详细信息模式) 时在第一列中显示。When the property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode). 必须将属性设置 为 `true` 以使用此方法检索项，并在子项边界内提供一个位置。You must set the property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem. 你还可以使用 方法检索有关特定位置中的项的详细信息。You can also use the method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location. 若要在中拖放项的重新定位 ，你可能想要使用 方法而不是 方法。To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a , you might want to use the method rather than the method. 方法查找最接近的项，而不考虑鼠标指针所在的位置。The method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located. 另一方面， `null` 如果指定的位置没有项，则方法返回。The method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location. > [!NOTE] > 只有在应用程序调用方法时，WINDOWS XP 和 Windows Server 2003 才支持此类 。The class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过 分别使用和枚举设置和属性来初始化 。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 用示例目录中的图片填充。The is populated with pictures from the Samples directory. 方法用于处理 控件的 事件，以确定是否选择了某个项。The method is used in when handling the control's event to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，则该事件处理程序会通过设置属性来显示选定的文件 。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例要求 C:\documents and 和 Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例 Pictures 目录中存在 JPG 文件。The example requires the existence of JPG files located in the C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializePictureBox` `PopulateListView` 在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用和方法 `Load` 。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都与事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非将 控件的属性设置为，否则属性不起作用 。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 属性允许您在显示 项及其子项时显示行来标识控件中显示的行和列。The property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the control when it displays items and their subitems. 显示的网格线不提供将行和列的大小调整为应用程序（如 Microsoft Excel）的功能。The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does. 如果显示列标题，则只能调整列的大小，方法是将鼠标指针移到列的右侧以调整大小，然后单击并拖动直到列达到您所需的大小。Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want. 网格线功能用于为控件的用户提供有关项和子项的可见边界。The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定一个 对象，该对象包含在显示组时要使用的图标。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying groups. 控件在显示图标时可以接受控件支持的任何图形格式 。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件不限制为 .ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 将分配给 属性后，可以将 控件中每个的的属性设置 为中相应图像的索引位置 。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 的图标的大小 由 属性指定。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用分组功能，您可以创建具有逻辑关系的直观分组 项。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每个组都包含一个文本标头，后跟一个横线和分配给该组的项。Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以将页眉文本与控件左对齐、右对齐或居中对齐。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值，则将显示分配给控件的任何组 。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 组通过将各项分成有用的类别来帮助用户找到他们所查找的项目。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 你可以创建所需的任何类别。You can create whatever categories you need. 一种典型的方法是根据列表排序的方式对项进行分组。One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted. 例如，如果列表按字母顺序排序，或者通过单击详细信息视图中的列标题对列表进行排序，则可以按项目名称的首字母对项进行分组。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 资源管理器使用这种类型的分组。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用分组功能，请将一个或多个 对象添加到 控件的集合 。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在构造函数中设置组头文本和标题的对齐方式 ，或使用 和属性进行设置 。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 若要暂时禁用分组功能，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the property to `false`. 可以通过在构造函数中指定组 、通过设置 属性或直接将项添加到组的集合，来将项分配给组 。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 所有项都应在显示之前分配给组。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 未分配给组的任何项都将显示在默认组中，其标题标签为 "DefaultGroup {0} "。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 默认组不包含在 集合中，因此无法更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要用于调试，以确保所有项都已正确添加到组中。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 一次只能在一个组中使用一项。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以通过 在运行时设置属性或通过将其添加到另一个组的集合来更改项所属的组 ，这会自动将其从上一个组中删除。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. 使用组时，插入标记功能处于禁用状态。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 这是因为分组功能按组成员身份对项进行排序，而插入标记功能用于在未对其项进行排序的控件中进行拖放重定位 。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. 当应用程序调用方法时，组仅可用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 。 groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，与组相关的任何代码都不起作用，并且不会显示这些组。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear. 因此，依赖于分组功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 你可能希望包含确定分组功能是否可用的代码，并在其不可用时提供其他功能。You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，当在不支持按组进行排序的操作系统上运行时，可能需要提供备用排序。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. 分组功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用 分组功能按详细信息视图中的子项值组织项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式的分组类似于 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在此示例中，将动态创建组。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列，将为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 对于 "父项" 列，将为每个唯一的初始字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 单击列标题可将项排序到为该列创建的组中。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次单击同一个列标题会反转组的顺序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件的属性 设置为 并且 控件具有 在中指定的对象 时，可以通过属性指定要显示的列标题的类型。The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the property of the control is set to and the control has objects specified in the . 对象定义控件中显示的列 。 objects define the columns that are displayed in the control. 每个列用于显示中每个项的子项信息 。Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the . 属性允许您指定列标题是否可见，如果列标题可见，则可以指定它们是否作为可单击的按钮。The property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则不会显示列标题，尽管控件的项和子项 仍按列排列。If the property is set to , the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the control are still arranged in columns. 如果将 属性设置为 ，列标题的作用类似于用户可以单击以执行某项操作的按钮，如 使用单击的列中的项作为键来对控件中的项进行排序。If the property is set to , the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the control using the items in the clicked column as a key. 可以在事件的处理程序中实现此行为 。You can implement this behavior in a handler for the event. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则列标题将显示，但不能单击。If the property is set to , the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 允许选择多个项的。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示如何设置 和 属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 它还演示了 、 和 属性。It also demonstrates the , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的对象 `ListView1` 和 名为的的窗体中 `TextBox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `false` ，控件中的选定项将 保持突出显示，而不是在 控件失去焦点时由操作系统指定的当前选择颜色。When this property is set to `false`, selected items in the control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color specified by the operating system when the control loses focus. 当用户单击窗体上的其他控件或移到另一个窗口时，可以使用此属性来保留用户选择的项。You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window. > [!NOTE] > 如果你担心应用程序的可访问性，建议将 属性设置为 `false` 。If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 允许选择多个项的。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示如何设置 和 属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 它还演示了 、 和 属性。It also demonstrates the , , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的对象 `ListView1` 和 名为的的窗体中 `TextBox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，用户可以指向控件中的项 以选择项。When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the control to select the item. 如果将属性设置为 true，则可以 (选择多个项 ) 方法是按住 CTRL 键，同时指向每个项。Multiple items can be selected (when the property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item. 您可以使用此功能为应用程序的用户提供更简单的方法，以便在控件中选择项 。You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertionMark As ListViewInsertionMark

summary.span: 获取一个对象，在 控件内拖动项时，该对象用来指示预期的放置位置。

span.span: Gets an object used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged within a control.

value.span: 表示插入标记的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the insertion mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入标记功能可让你在将项拖动到新位置时，直观地指示拖放操作中的预期放置位置。The insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 此功能仅在以下情况下有效 ：当属性设置为时 `true` ，如果 控件未自动对项进行排序，则为。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自动排序， 属性必须设置为 ，并且属性必须设置为 、 或 。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入标记功能可能与分组功能不可见， 因为分组功能按组成员对项目进行排序。Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 类通常用于或事件的处理程序中，用于在 拖动项时更新插入标记的位置。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 它还在或事件的处理程序中用于将 拖动的项插入到正确的位置。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 ListView 控件中显示插入标记](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control)。For more information, see and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control). > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序调用方法时，插入标记功能仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用 。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统中，与插入标记相关的任何代码都不会有影响，并且插入标记也不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear. 因此，依赖于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly. 你可能希望包含用于确定此功能是否可用的代码，并在其不可用时提供其他功能。You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要在不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行时，绕过实现拖放项重定位的所有代码。For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入标记功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature. 此示例使用标准拖动事件实现了拖放项的重新排序。This example implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户激活控件中的一个或多个项时发生此事件 。The event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 用户可以通过单击或双击来激活项，具体取决于属性的值 ，或使用键盘。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 从事件的事件处理程序中 ，可以引用 或 属性来访问中选定项的集合， 以确定要激活的项。From within the event handler for the event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要 在控件中的每一项旁显示复选框，则必须将属性设置为 true 。The property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the control. 当项的选中状态更改或 属性设置为时，将发生此事件 `true` 。The event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the property is set to `true`. 您可以为事件创建事件处理程序， 以便在每次在控件中签入项时更改项的图标状态或其他特定于应用程序的任务 。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果在引发事件时未创建窗口句柄 ，则会延迟事件。If the window handle has not been created when the event is raised, the event will be delayed. 创建窗口句柄后 (当窗体) 显示时， 将引发任何延迟事件。Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed events will be raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 用于处理事件的选中控件 。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 方法使用 和 属性来检索和计算选定菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的和名为的的窗体中 `ListView` `ListView1` `TextBox` `Textbox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a `ListView` named `ListView1` and a `TextBox` named `Textbox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保 事件与此示例中的事件处理程序相关联。Ensure that the event is associated with the event handler in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 此属性返回的，您可以添加项、移除项以及获取项的计数。Using the returned by this property, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of items. 有关可通过集合中的项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅 类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在虚拟模式下， 当多个项的选择状态更改时，将发生事件。In virtual mode, the event will occur when the selection state of multiple items changes. 无论项状态是否从选定项更改为选定状态，都将发生此事件。The event occurs whether the item state changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，用户可以通过单击项文本将其选中，然后再次单击项文本将标签文本置于编辑模式，从而修改项的文本。When the property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode. 然后，用户可以修改或替换项的文本标签。The user can then modify or replace the item's text label. 您可以使用 和 事件来执行用户编辑项文本之前和之后的任务。You can use the and events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text. 如果将此属性设置为，则不能修改子项的文本 `true` 。The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`. 若要更改子项的文本，可以在用户双击控件中的子项时向用户显示一个对话框。To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 或 ，则不允许使用标签编辑，无论属性的值如何 。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，如果需要，项文本将被换到下一行文本。When the property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed. 如果文本长度超过两行文本，则缩短文本。If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened. 如果用户选择项，则会显示所有项文本。If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed. 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则所有项文本都显示在一行上。If the property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line. 当设置为时，将显示整个项文本 `false` 。The entire item text is displayed when the is set to `false`. 仅当 属性设置为或时，才使用此 属性 。This property is only used when the property is set to or .

summary.span: 获取或设置当项以大图标在控件中显示时使用的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定一个 对象，该对象包含在 将属性设置为) 时显示带有大图标 (项时要使用的图标 。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ). 控件在显示图标时可以接受控件支持的任何图形格式 。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件不限制为 .ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 将分配给 属性后，可以将 控件中每个的的属性设置 为中相应图像的索引位置 。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 的图标的大小 由指定 。The size of the icons for the is specified by the . 由于只能为属性指定一个索引，因此 和属性中指定的对象 应具有与要显示的图像相同的索引位置。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果将的 属性 设置为0，则在 和属性中指定的对象中，用于小型和大图标的图像应位于同一索引位置 。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果用键指定了图像，则仍需要将图像的小型和大型版本放置在其各自的图像列表中的同一索引位置。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 在视图之间切换时，使用一个列表中的图像的索引位置来查找另一个列表中的图像，而不考虑指定的键值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要设置在使用 小图标显示项时使用 (除) 以外的所有视图模式 ，请使用 属性。To set the to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than ), use the property. 如果要使用图像显示项状态，请使用 属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 获取或设置用于控件的排序比较器。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.

value.span: ，表示用于控件的排序比较器。

span.span: An that represents the sorting comparer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定在 调用方法或将项添加到列表中时执行控件中的项排序的对象。The property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a control when the method is called or when items are added to the list. 请注意，当项的标签文本更改时，它们不会自动排序。Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes. 指定的对象必须是实现接口的类的实例 ，该接口具有一个名为的方法 。The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the interface, which has a single method called . 您可以使用此属性来提供自定义排序，例如，在详细信息视图中单击列标题时。You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view. 为此，请创建一个实现接口的类， 并提供接受排序所依据的列的索引的构造函数。To do this, create a class that implements the interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by. 然后，可以 使用所单击列的索引为创建此类的实例的事件实现处理程序。You can then implement a handler for the event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column. 将 属性设置为新的实例时，将 使用指定的对象自动对控件进行排序。When you set the property to the new instance, the control is automatically sorted using the specified object. 对方法的后续调用 使用相同的对象。Subsequent calls to the method use the same object. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性的值时 ， 会自动调用方法。When you set the value of the property, the method is called automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件，该控件在单击控件中的列时手动对项进行排序 。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为 `ListViewItemComparer` 的类，该类实现 执行比较的接口 。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建一个实例 `ListViewItemComparer` ，并使用它来设置 控件的属性 。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 事件处理程序中的方法调用 使用在中定义的方法 `ListViewItemComparer` ，根据所单击的列来执行项的排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以选择多个项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.

value.span: 如果可以一次选择控件中的多个项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，可以在控件中选择多个项 。When the property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the control. 若要选择多个项，用户必须在单击要选择的项的同时按住 CTRL 键。To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select. 通过单击要选择的第一项，然后在按住 SHIFT 键的同时单击最后一个要选择的项，可以选择连续项。Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select. 您可以使用 "多重选择" 功能选择控件中的多个项 ，并对所有选定项执行操作。You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the control and perform an operation on all the items selected. 例如，用户可以选择多个项目，然后右键单击所选项目以显示一个快捷菜单，其中显示了一组可对所选项目执行的任务。For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items. 若要确定在控件中选择了哪些项 ，请使用 属性。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property. 属性允许您访问 包含选定项列表的。The property allows you to access the that contains a list of the selected items. 如果你希望中的索引位置 而不是项，则可以使用 属性来访问 。If you want the index positions in the instead of the items, you can use the property to access the . 如果你不希望允许在中进行多项选择 ，但仍希望为用户提供一种方法来选择多个项目，则可以通过将 属性设置为来显示复选框 `true` 。If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the , yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 允许选择多个项的。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 该示例演示如何设置 和 属性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的对象 `ListView1` 和 名为的的窗体中 `TextBox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件将 新编辑的标签限制为字母表中的字符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 该示例使用 类获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果该字符在表示数字的 ASCII 代码之间，则新标签不能应用于该项目。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 此示例要求你已 在窗体上创建了一个控件并向其中添加了项。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 该示例还要求您已将事件连接 到在代码示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 为了使用 类，您的文件必须包含 命名空间。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件，该控件在单击控件中的列时手动对项进行排序 。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为 `ListViewItemComparer` 的类，该类实现 执行比较的接口 。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建一个实例 `ListViewItemComparer` ，并使用它来设置 控件的属性 。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 事件处理程序中的方法调用 使用在中定义的方法 `ListViewItemComparer` ，根据所单击的列来执行项的排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是由操作系统绘制，还是由您提供的代码绘制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.

value.span: 如果 控件由您提供的代码绘制，则为 ；如果 控件由操作系统绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the control is drawn by code that you provide; if the control is drawn by the operating system.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由操作系统绘制控件。A control is normally drawn by the operating system. 为了自定义 项、子项和列标题的外观，请将 属性设置为，并为 `true` 以下一个或多个事件提供处理程序： 、 、 。In order to customize the appearance of items, subitems, and column headers, set the property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: , , . 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. 当 属性设置为时 ，将发生所有三个事件; 否则，仅 发生事件。When the property is set to , all three events occur; otherwise, only the event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 子项信息通常显示在图块视图和详细信息视图中，但在磁贴视图中，必须在事件的处理程序中进行绘制 。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 对于 没有 对象已添加到集合中的任何子项，不会发生该事件 。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 另请注意，每个对象的第一个子项 表示父项本身，并显示在第一列中。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 在详细信息视图中，你可以处理 事件以绘制所有子项（如背景）的通用元素，并处理 事件以绘制单个子项（如文本值）的元素。In the details view, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 你还可以仅使用两个事件中的一个来绘制控件中的所有项 ，但这可能不太方便。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要在详细信息视图中绘制列标题，必须处理 事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免在所有者绘制时图形闪烁的问题，请重写 控件并将 属性设置为 `true` 。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为控件提供自定义绘图 。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 该示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 具有负值的子项具有红色的前景和黑色背景。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 事件的处理程序 绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 事件的处理程序 绘制文本值以及具有负值的子项的文本和背景。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 事件的处理程序 绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. 组件提供一种在详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换的方法。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，只 会引发事件。In the list view, only the event is raised. 在这种情况下，会在事件处理程序中绘制文本和背景 。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则 当项数超过控件的工作区大小时，将显示一个垂直滚动条以供使用。When this property is set to `true`, the displays a vertical scroll bar to use when the number of items exceeds the size of the client area of the control. 使用此属性可以确保用户可以访问控件中的所有可用项 。You can use this property to ensure that the user can access all items that are available in the control. > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本2.0 之前的版本中，在将此属性设置为 `false` 并调整控件的大小时，列标题不会正确绘制。In versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0, the column headers were not painted correctly when setting this property to `false` and resizing the control to make it larger. 若要解决此问题，请将此属性设置为 `true` 事件处理程序中的，然后 `false` 在 事件处理程序中将其设置回。To work around this issue, set this property to `true` in a event handler and set it back to `false` in a event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 处于虚拟模式并且 调用了或方法时，将发生此事件 。This event occurs when a is in virtual mode and the or method is called. 当处理此事件时，您应计算属性提供的项列表中的哪一项 与搜索条件匹配，并将 属性设置为的索引 。When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the property matches the search criteria and set the property to the index of the . 如果未提供项，则 将返回 `null` 。If an item is not provided, and will return `null`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，搜索将最接近的匹配项返回到前10000个正方形列表中的指定整数。In the example, a search returns the nearest match to a specified integer in a list of the first ten thousand squares. 此代码示例是为属性提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要更改的属性，集合就会发生更改 。The collection changes whenever the property of a changes. 可以通过编程方式或用户选择项或清除项的选择，来进行属性更改。The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item. 如果用户在没有按下 CTRL 键的情况下选择某个项来执行多重选择，则该控件将首先清除以前的选定内容。When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection. 在这种情况下，对于之前选择的每个项，此事件会发生一次，而对于新选定项，则会发生一次。In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item. 若要确定在控件中选择了哪些项 ，请使用 属性来访问 。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property to access the . 你可以创建此事件的事件处理程序，以便在控件中的选定项发生更改时执行任务 。You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性、 事件、 成员和 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, event, members, and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的对象 `ListView1` 和 名为的的窗体中 `TextBox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例要求正确与事件关联的事件处理程序 This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定一个 对象，该对象包含在 将属性设置为) 以外的任何值时，在显示小图标 (项时要使用的图标 。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the property is set to any value other than ). 控件在显示图标时可以接受控件支持的任何图形格式 。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控件不限制为 .ico 文件。The control is not limited to .ico files. 将分配给 属性后，可以将 控件中每个的的属性设置 为中相应图像的索引位置 。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 的图标的大小 由 属性指定。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property. 由于只能为属性指定一个索引，因此 和属性中指定的对象 应具有与要显示的图像相同的索引位置。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 例如，如果将的 属性 设置为0，则在 和属性中指定的对象中，用于小型和大图标的图像应位于同一索引位置 。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果用键指定了图像，则仍需要将图像的小型和大型版本放置在其各自的图像列表中的同一索引位置。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 在视图之间切换时，使用一个列表中的图像的索引位置来查找另一个列表中的图像，而不考虑指定的键值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要将 属性设置为) 时，将设置为在显示具有大图标 (项时使用 ，请使用 属性。To set the to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ), use the property. 如果要使用图像显示项状态，请使用 属性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用属性对项进行排序 ，该属性基于项文本对项进行排序。Typically items are sorted using the property, which sorts items based on the item text. 若要自定义排序顺序，必须编写一个实现接口的类 ，并将 属性设置为该类的对象。To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the interface and set the property to an object of that class. 例如，当你想要按子项文本对项进行排序时，这会很有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text. 有关对项执行手动排序的详细信息，请参阅属性的示例 。For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the property. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值 ，或者如果设置了 属性，则在添加项目时，将自动对列表进行排序。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added. 标签文本更改时，不会自动对项目进行排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.
