remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定是否在控件中对项进行排序 。The property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the control. 默认情况下，不执行任何排序。By default, no sorting is performed. 当 属性设置为或时，中的项将按 升序字母顺序进行排序 (当) 属性设置为 ) 时 (按字母 顺序排序。When the property is set to or , the items in the are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ). 您可以使用此属性对控件中显示的项进行自动排序， 以便在有大量项可用时更便于用户查找项。You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available. 如果要执行自己的项排序而不是使用 属性，请将 属性与方法结合使用 。If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the property, use the property in combination with the method. 如果将 属性设置为以外的值 ，或者如果设置了 属性，则在添加项目时，将自动对该列表进行排序。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added. 标签文本更改时，不会自动对项目进行排序。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定 ，其中包含用于表示控件中的项的应用程序特定状态的图像 。The property allows you to specify an that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a control. 状态图像显示在该项的图标的左侧。State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item. 您可以使用状态图像（如选中和未选中的复选框）来指示应用程序定义的项状态。You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states. 状态图像在控件的所有视图中均可见 。State images are visible in all views of the control. 如果 在属性中指定了 并将 属性设置为，则将 `true` 显示中索引位置0和1之间的图像， 而不是复选框。If an is specified in the property and the property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 显示位于索引位置0的图像而不是未选中的复选框，并显示索引位置1处的图像而不是选中的复选框。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.

span.span: Gets or sets the first visible item in the control.

value.span: ，表示控件中的第一个可见项。

span.span: A that represents the first visible item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，索引位置为零的项 (0) 位于控件的顶部 。Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the control. 如果 控件内容滚动，则不同的项可以位于控件的顶部。If the control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control. 您可以使用此属性来指示或确定哪些项在控件的顶部可见 。You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the control. 属性的值 不会始终保留，这取决于所需的顶级项在列表视图中的位置。The value of the property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view. 控件中随时可见的项的数目 取决于列表视图的高度以及它所包含的项的大小。The number of items visible in a control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains. 如果项超过列表视图的高度，则项将继续在多个页上，用户可以滚动浏览。If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through. 如果将属性设置 为的最后一页中的项，则 该项将自动滚动到视图中; 但是， 将设置为最后一页的实际顶部项。If you set the property to an item in the last page of the , the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, will be set to the actual top item of the last page. 若要确保特定项位于控件的可见区域 (但不一定在 top 位置) ，请使用 方法。To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当属性值为时，设置此属性不起作用 `false` 。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. > > 在版本2.0 之前的版本中不支持设置此属性 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 。Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过使用 属性和方法重置对象子项的样式 。The following code example demonstrates resetting the style of a object's subitems through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体 `Button1` 中，并 `InitializeListView` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1` and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改 2.0 中的控件可以 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 设置自定义状态图像，以指示项是选中还是未选中或处于不确定状态。Changes to the control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state. 添加此功能 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 后，2.0 的行为与 .NET Framework 1.1 的行为不同。With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1. 如果你创建了依赖于1.1 中行为的应用程序 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] ，请确保将 属性设置为 `true` （默认值）。If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the property is set to `true`, which is the default value. 为了充分利用自定义状态图像，请将设置 为 `false` 。In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] 设计器，则 属性将设置为 `false` 。If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer, the property will be set to `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置项在控件中的显示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how items are displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定控件用于显示项的显示类型 。The property allows you to specify the type of display the control uses to display items. 可以将属性设置 为显示具有大图标或小图标的每个项，或者在垂直列表中显示项。You can set the property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list. 最丰富的选项是详细信息视图，它允许您不仅查看项，还可以查看为每个项指定的任何子项。The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item. 每一项都显示在网格中，其中每一项都垂直列出，每个项都显示在列中，具有列标题。Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers. 详细信息视图是向用户显示数据库信息的一种绝佳方式。The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user. 使用 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，你还可以将项显示为磁贴，通过显示大图标以及所选子项信息来平衡图形和文本信息。With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing. 若要启用磁贴视图，应用程序必须调用 方法。To enable tile view, your application must call the method. 小型图像视图显示每个项，图标的右侧显示一个图标和文本信息。The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon. 大图像视图显示每个项，图标的下方显示一个图标和文本信息。The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon. 图像列表的图标的大小由的 属性的 或 属性指定。The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the property of the for the or properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用多个图像列表（对于小图标视图和大图标视图，使用 控件），则应将图像的小型和大型版本放置在其各自的图像列表中的同一索引位置。If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 在视图之间切换时，使用一个列表中的图像的索引位置来查找另一个列表中的图像，而不考虑指定的键值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 控件中的大多数属性 会影响不同视图的行为或显示方式。Most of the properties in the control affect how the different views behave or are displayed. 某些影响项的视图的属性仅在 属性设置为特定值时才有用，而其他属性在所有视图中都很有用。Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views. 例如，属性（如 和） 仅在属性设置为时才有用，而 和 属性在所有视图中都很有用。For example, properties such as and are only useful when the property is set to , while the and properties are useful in all views. 下表显示了其中的某些 成员和有效视图。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成员ListView member|视图View| |---------------------|----------| | 属性 property| 或 or | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| ||除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 属性 property|除之外的所有视图 All views except | | 属性 property|| | 属性 property|、 或 , , or | 您可以使用 属性在您的应用程序中提供不同的数据视图，或锁定特定视图以利用该视图的优点。You can use the property to provide different views of data in your application, or to lock a specific view to utilize that view's benefits. 例如， 属性通常设置为， 因为 "详细信息视图" 提供了许多在其他视图中不可用的查看选项。For example, the property is often set to because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views. > [!NOTE] > 如果 控件没有指定任何列标题，并且您将 属性设置为，则 该 控件不会显示任何项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any items. 如果 控件没有指定任何列标题，并且您将 属性设置为，则 该 控件不会显示任何子项。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any subitems. 磁贴视图显示每个项目，左侧有一个大图标，右侧有文本信息。The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right. 文本信息由项标签后跟子项组成。The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems. 默认情况下，仅显示第一个子项，这对应于项标签。By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label. 若要显示其他子项，你必须将 对象添加到 集合中。To display additional subitems, you must add objects to the collection. 磁贴中的每个子项对应于一个列标题。Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header. 若要控制显示哪些子项以及显示它们的顺序，您必须为每个项目设置 属性，并 为每个标头设置属性。To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the property for each item and the property for each header. 然后，你可以在集合中添加、删除和重新排列标头 以获得所需的结果。You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the collection to achieve the desired result. 若要在图块视图中控制磁贴的大小，请设置 属性。To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the property. 这有助于防止子项文本对于单个行过长过长。This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line. 有关图块视图的示例，请参见 属性。For an example of the tile view, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 尽管列只在详细信息视图中显示，但没有列标题的子项将不会显示在 "详细信息视图" 或 "磁贴" 视图中。Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view. 当应用程序调用方法时，磁贴视图仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用 。The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，任何与磁贴视图相关的代码都不起作用，且 控件将显示在大图标视图中。On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the control displays in the large icon view. 因此，依赖于磁贴视图的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly. 你可能希望包含确定磁贴视图是否可用的代码，并在其不可用时提供其他功能。You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，当你使用所有者描述自定义 磁贴视图中项的外观时，如果在不支持磁贴视图的操作系统上运行，则可能需要使用适用于大图标视图的绘制代码。For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view. 磁贴视图功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不 在虚拟模式下，则 将发生事件。If the is not in virtual mode, the event will occur. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性以将置于 `true` 虚拟模式下。Setting the property to `true` puts the into virtual mode. 在虚拟模式下， 不使用正常集合。In Virtual mode, the normal collection is unused. 相反， 对象是根据需要动态创建的 。Instead, objects are created dynamically as the requires them. 虚拟模式在许多情况下都很有用。Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances. 如果 必须从内存中已经存在的超大型集合填充对象，则 为每个项创建一个对象可能会浪费。If a object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a object for each entry can be wasteful. 在虚拟模式下，仅创建所需的项。In virtual mode, only the items required are created. 在其他情况下， 可能需要频繁地重新计算对象的值，对整个集合执行此操作将产生不可接受的性能。In other cases, the values of the objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance. 在虚拟模式下，只计算所需的项。In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated. 若要使用虚拟模式，必须处理 事件，该事件在每次需要项时引发 。In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the event, which is raised every time the requires an item. 此事件处理程序应创建 属于指定索引处的对象。This event handler should create the object that belongs at the specified index. 此外，必须将 属性设置为虚拟列表的大小。In addition, the property must be set to the size of the virtual list. 处理 事件时，可以在虚拟模式下进行搜索。Handling the event enables searching in virtual mode. 如果未处理此事件，则 和 方法将返回 `null` 。If this event is not handled, the and methods will return `null`. 可以处理 事件，以便维护对象的缓存 。You can handle the event in order to maintain a cache of objects. 如果用于创建对象的计算或查找 成本高昂，则维护缓存可以提高性能。If the calculation or lookup to create a object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 在将设置为时，该值将自动更改为 `true` 。If the property is set to , the value will automatically be changed to when is set to `true`. 在虚拟模式下， 集合处于禁用状态。In virtual mode, the collection is disabled. 尝试访问它会导致 。Attempting to access it results in an . 集合和集合也是如此 。The same is true of the collection and the collection. 如果要检索选定或选中的项，请改用 和 集合。If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the and collections instead. ## Examples 此示例演示一个简单的 内容，其内容为前10000个正方形。This example illustrates a simple whose contents are the first ten thousand squares. 它处理搜索并使用缓存来提高性能。It handles searching and uses a cache for increased performance.
